name: WebsterWorld1 Multiple Choice Quiz | Vocabulary | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these words is 'a small gland at the base of a male bladder'?
questions.explanation:
prostate.

	'Prostrate' means lying down with the face to the ground. It is often confused with 'prostate'.

options: something having a rank taste or smell

questions.text: Which of these words is a 'wine bottle that holds about 2 quarts'?
Which of these words is defined as 'in comparison with or to something'?
questions.explanation:
than.

	'Than' and 'then' are often confused. 'Then' is defined as 'at that time; soon or immediately'.

questions.text: Which of these words mean 'to make or shape with an axe'?
questions.explanation:
hew.

	'Hue' means ' a graduation of color, a particular color a shade'.

questions.text: What word means 'to move emotionally; to influence'?
questions.explanation:
affect.

	'Effect' means 'something produced by a cause; the power to produce the desired result'.

obstinate, hard to control.

	Of course 'to move ahead' is 'forward' not 'froward'.

questions.text: Which word means 'a sly look or sideways glance expressing desire or malicious intent'?
